name: My Portfolio (marcelosolorzano)
description:
My portfolio is a 3D interactive room that provides an innovative, compelling, hands-on way in which you can browse my work as a game developer.

Everything in the room was totally made by myself. As a matter of fact in order to develop this game I had to work on sound design, modelling, texturing, rigging, animating and coding, to mention a few.

Controls

  • Use the WASD or arrow keys to move and the mouse to turn.
  • Left click to dance or interact with the speech bubbles.
  • Hold down left shift to run and press space bar to jump.

You can use the Tab key to see the controls if you forget any of them.

Credits

Game by Marcelo Solórzano Astorga.

Intro Music
"New York Jazz Loop" by FoolBoyMedia
